channel.title: [RELEASE] Bandos gloves [RELEASE]
channel.description:
Hello. Here you go bandos gloves:
Download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/UKTHKZZH]http://uppit.com/v/UKTHKZZH[/url]
Pictures: Inventory: [IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/Bandosglovesinv.jpg[/img]
Look: [IMG]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/bandosgloveslook.jpg[/img]
Now open your client's class8.java then add this code: [code]if(i == 13635) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14043; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 400; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14044;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14044;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Bandos gloves";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Gloves from the hell".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
Now save and compile then log in to your server and say: [code]14044[/code] [code]14043[/code] Then close your client, compile and run again.
Now go to your server's folder then open item.java and search:[code]gloves[/code] Then add bandos glove's item id here:P
Please post replys:P

item.title: [RELEASE] Bandos gloves [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Hello. Here you go bandos gloves:

Download: http://uppit.com/v/UKTHKZZH

Pictures:
Inventory:

Look:

Now open your client’s class8.java then add this code:

if(i == 13635) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14043; //Model ID // 20233 class8.anInt181 = 400; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14044;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 14044;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Bandos gloves";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Gloves from the hell".getBytes();//examin info }

Now save and compile then log in to your server and say:

14044
14043

Then close your client, compile and run again.

Now go to your server’s folder then open item.java and search:gloves
Then add bandos glove’s item id here:P

Please post replys:P

Read full topic
